mac.name: Micro Snitch
mac.description: Ever wondered if an application records audio through your Macs built-in microphone without your knowledge?

mac.name: Little Snitch
mac.description: As soon as you are connected to the Internet, applications can potentially send whatever they want to wherever they want

mac.name: Oversight
mac.description: Mac malware often spies on users by recording audio and video sessions... sometimes in an undetected manner.

mac.name: Onyx
mac.description: OnyX is a multifunction utility that you can use to verify the structure of the system files

mac.name: Sexy.privacy
mac.description: Enforce privacy & security best-practices on macOS. System file cleaner

mac.name: Lulu
mac.description: In today's connected world, it is rare to find an application or piece of malware that doesn't talk to a remote server. LuLu is the free, open-source, firewall for Macs, that can protect your network connections and detect malicious activity

mac.name: Matrix
mac.description: An open network for secure, decentralized communication
